story:
Once upon a time, in a land filled with beauty and wonder, there was a little girl named Lily. Lily was a kind and curious child, always eager to learn about the world around her. She lived in a cozy cottage with her mother and father, who loved her very much.

One day, Lily asked her mother, "Mama, why do we believe in God?"

Her mother smiled and took Lily's hand. "My dear, we believe in God because He is the one who created everything in the world. He is our loving Father in heaven, who watches over us and guides us."

Lily thought about this for a moment. "But how do we know He is real?" she asked.

Her mother took her to the window and pointed to the stars in the sky. "Look at the stars, Lily. They shine brightly in the night sky, reminding us that God is always with us. Just as the stars light up the night, God's love lights up our hearts."

Lily looked up at the stars and felt a warm feeling in her heart. She knew that God was real and that He loved her very much.

That night, as Lily lay in bed, she closed her eyes and whispered a prayer. "Dear God, thank you for creating the world and for loving me. Please watch over me and my family while we sleep. Amen."

As she drifted off to sleep, Lily dreamed of a beautiful garden, filled with flowers of every color. In the center of the garden was a lovely tree, with branches that stretched up to the sky. And at the top of the tree was a bright star, shining down on the garden and filling it with light.

Lily knew that the star was God, watching over her and keeping her safe. And she felt His love surrounding her, just as the stars surrounded her in the night sky.

The end.

Good night, my child. May God's love surround you and keep you safe as you sleep. Amen.
